#summary &dashv; character entity

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesD D] > &dashv;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Dashv;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2ae4/index.htm U+02AE4].
  * `&dashv;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/22a3/index.htm U+022A3].
